title: Ford pickup truck sales in December help narrow overall sales decline in 2022

sentiment.Tldr: Ford Motor reported a 2.2% sales loss in the US in 2022, but increased sales of its F-Series pickups in December. Ford's sales outpaced the industry, which was estimated to be down by 9%. Ford gained 0.7 percentage points of market share in 2022, and maintained its status as the second-best seller of EVs. Ford brand's sales were down 2.1%, while Lincoln brand was off by 4%.
